headline: Shopping Spree – Sales Of Ultra-Large XXL TVs Have Skyrocketed 877% As Prices Drop By 53% In The Past Year
summary: According to Circana, a market research company, sales of ultra-large TVs – 97 inches and bigger – have gone up by 877% in the last year, while prices have dropped by 53%. More than 70% of Best Buy’s (NYSE:BBY) stores in the United States now feature these ultra-large TVs, making it simpler to see and buy them. headline: Best Buy : brings dedicated Breville space into select stores
summary: By Best Buy November 15, 2024 Every holiday season, small appliances are a popular choice on wish lists, and this year is no different. That's why Best Buy is introducing new dedicated in-store spaces...
